meanings.definition: To obtain by request or entreaty.
meanings.sent1: She impetrates a favor from her friend by asking politely.
meanings.sent2: He impetrates permission to leave early by explaining his situation.
meanings.sent3: The cat impetrates extra treats by giving its owner a cute look.
meanings.sent4: The student impetrates a passing grade through hard work and dedication.
meanings.sent5: The farmer impetrates a good harvest by carefully tending to his crops.

meanings.definition: To secure or achieve through persistence or effort.
meanings.sent1: The athlete impetrates victory by training hard every day.
meanings.sent2: She impetrates a promotion at work by consistently exceeding expectations.
meanings.sent3: The detective impetrates the truth by following every lead diligently.
meanings.sent4: The explorer impetrates new discoveries by venturing into uncharted territories.
meanings.sent5: The scientist impetrates breakthroughs by conducting numerous experiments.
